website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Suede Classic B-BOY shoe is every break dancer’s grail sneakers. The sought after Puma Suede Classic silhouette has been a fixture in the breakdancing and hip-hop movements since the 1980s that its fame continues up to the present in this 50th-anniversary special edition footwear.From dance battles and competitions all over the world, the top breakers in the world don the Puma Suede Classic B-BOY with its signature golden lace plates and fat laces. With its affordable pricing, copping a pair of this special edition kicks is necessary especially if you are a serious break-dancer.
pros: An overwhelming majority of customers were satisfied with their purchase of the 50th-anniversary special edition of the Puma Suede Classic B-BOY
Many buyers say they will recommend the Puma Suede Classic B-BOY shoes to their friends
Some of those who gave rave reviews to the sneaker were breakdancers who have bought the sneakers in the 1980s and have decided to buy this special edition sneaker
The gold-plated Suede logo and 1968 lace tips add premium detailing and old school hip-hop vibes to the classic B-BOY sneaker, a large number of reviewers commented
A couple of break dancers bought these sneakers for nostalgic purposes
Some gave positive reviews that the shoe’s overall looks, comfort, and durability did not diminish over time
Some comments of reviewers on their first look impressions on the Puma Suede Classic B-BOY shoes include “fantastic,” “nice,” and “brilliant.”
Numerous observers are impressed that Puma included extra fat laces for more styling options
Several observers say that the three colorway options, unique detailing, and extra fat laces that stay close to the original design makes this sneaker an instant cop
The special edition shoes run true to size, a couple of reviewers noted
Quite a lot of reviewers say they got their money’s worth with these budget-friendly sneakers
cons: One customer raised issues on the suede material that bleeds when rubbed on the laces, socks, and clothing
A couple of reviewers say that online pictures are sometimes far from on feet appearance
One reviewer found out that the shoe was in red and not in orange in what was seen online

customer_reviews.title: Old School Puma!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking special edition Puma. I used to wear these in high school and always had a sweet spot for Puma. Now I am able to purchase and wear them again. The thick laces and gold tags that come with the sneaker adds an extra valued look that I really like!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cee Bee

customer_reviews.title: pumas sizes!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: why the ladys pumas look better? that's not fair . if I want a new color you cant get all the colors over size 12. that's not fair the classic b boy all black with the black they all so have a green one with the black . green laces an the gold plates 1968 an suede gold plate. they say mens but its size 6 an down that not fair. the ladys an kids get the best shoe
customer_reviews.author: Errol W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice version of a classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: The suede Pumas are a classic shoe. These are a nice 50th anniversary edition and come with gold finish badges for the laces to add a little B-Boy flair.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: So Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Very cool shoe! Nobody has these bad boys around my way! They are very fresh!
customer_reviews.author: douglas patenaude

customer_reviews.title: So fresh!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!!! Keep in mind tie box is a little large so go down a half size. Had tons of compliments on these!!
customer_reviews.author: Sayit right

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE
customer_reviews.text: FITS GREAT AND TRUE TO SIZE AND HAS THAT OLD SCHOOL LOOK THAT I LOVE! YOU WILL TOO! RECOMMEND HIGHLY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Always been a huge fan of Pumas, now my kids are even bigger fans of them. Purchased these for back 2 school and they look great and my son says they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these shoes for my Son, He loves and they came very fast
customer_reviews.author: Jaymusic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe! I can’t wait for my son to see these.
customer_reviews.author: Cheleshocked

customer_reviews.title: brillant
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable the color is amazing love love love these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kick Ass!🤯
customer_reviews.text: Puma rules! Forget about Nike or adidas, this is where it’s at!
customer_reviews.author: stephen kizel

customer_reviews.title: What happen?
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was as expected but the box was destroyed. I keep my shoe boxes to protect my shoes. Was very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Check sizes
customer_reviews.text: Recieved 2 different sizes. Noticed it as soon as I unboxed it not sure how they didnt see this before shipping out .
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have to return this product because it does fit
customer_reviews.author: Marcarthur Mercidieu

customer_reviews.title: 50 year shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe. Great color, and fit. I put extra padding in the shoe and that made them more comfortable; in fact, I can walk in them all day. The shoe was had markings that indicated it was the 50 yr. anniversary of Puma introducing their suede sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Kicks
customer_reviews.text: I love this 50 year anniversary edition sneaker!! The gold color 1968 and suede lace logos really give them a retro look. A must for old school hip hop fans or just fans of old school Pumas in general. I just wish they made them in other colors besides red and black
customer_reviews.author: JMAC68

product_meta.title: Puma - Mens Suede Classic Bboy Fabulous Shoes
product_meta.description: Puma celebrates their classic Suede with the Suede Classic BBoy Fabulous. Gold plate accents on the laces compliment the tooled suede upper, offering a celebration of Pumas classic silhouette. The 1968 lace plate is a callback to 50 years of style with the classic Suede, and a second lace option offers a plate with Suede imprinted on it. When it comes to classic style, Puma brings the best to your collection.
